processing.text: declare @q nvarchar(4000), @duplicate nvarchar(512), @field varchar(32), @user int, @admin bit, @r int, @wsID varchar(8), @voucherID varchar(8), @locked nvarchar(512) declare @count int, @m int, @checkInvoices char(1) select @voucherID = '&Code;' select @locked = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đã khóa số liệu, kiểm tra lại ngày chứng từ tại dòng %s.' else N'Data is locked, please check the date of voucher at row %s.' end select @duplicate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'&s1; đã tồn tại.' else '&s2; already exists.' end select @checkInvoices = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_kthd_tdv' select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ws_id' select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID from dmstt select @m = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = 'wrkcolumns' and column_name = 'so_ct' if @admin <> 1 begin if @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@admin, @user, 'InputVATEntry', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end end select @count = count(*) from @@table select ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct into #unit from @@table -- Locked Date &ImportLockedDateCheck; &CommandCheckTaxCodeImport; update @@table set so_ct = space(@m - len(rtrim(so_ct))) + ltrim(so_ct), so_ct0 = space(@m - len(rtrim(so_ct0))) + ltrim(so_ct0), ngay_ct0 = case when a.ngay_ct0 is null then a.ngay_ct else a.ngay_ct0 end, ten_kh = case when a.ten_kh <> '' then a.ten_kh else isnull(rtrim(b.ten_kh), '') end, thue_suat = c.thue_suat, tk_thue_no = case when a.tk_thue_no = '' then isnull(rtrim(c.tk_thue_no3), '') else rtrim(a.tk_thue_no) end from @@table a left join dmkh b on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh left join dmthue c on a.ma_thue = c.ma_thue -- Checking &Checking; if @checkInvoices = '1' begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', stt, 'C001' from @@table a join (select ma_so_thue, ngay_ct0, so_seri0, so_ct0 from @@table group by ma_so_thue, ngay_ct0, so_seri0, so_ct0 having count(1) > 1) b on a.ngay_ct0 = b.ngay_ct0 and a.ma_so_thue = b.ma_so_thue and a.so_seri0 = b.so_seri0 and a.so_ct0 = b.so_ct0 &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', stt, 'C001' from @@table a where exists (select 1 from ctgt30 b where (a.ma_dvcs <> b.ma_dvcs or a.ma_mau_ct <> b.ma_mau_ct) and a.ngay_ct0 = b.ngay_ct0 and a.ma_so_thue = b.ma_so_thue and a.so_seri0 = b.so_seri0 and a.so_ct0 = b.so_ct0 and b.ma_ct = @voucherID) &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a group by ma_so_thue, ngay_ct0, so_seri0, so_ct0 having count(1) > 1 if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(@duplicate, '%s1', so_ct0), '%s2', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end select @r = min(stt) from @@table a where exists (select 1 from ctgt30 b where (a.ma_dvcs <> b.ma_dvcs or a.ma_mau_ct <> b.ma_mau_ct) and a.ngay_ct0 = b.ngay_ct0 and a.ma_so_thue = b.ma_so_thue and a.so_seri0 = b.so_seri0 and a.so_ct0 = b.so_ct0 and b.ma_ct = @voucherID) if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(@duplicate, '%s1', so_ct0), '%s2', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end end end -- Delete if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from ctgt30 b where a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ngay_ct0 = b.ngay_ct0 and a.so_ct0 = b.so_ct0 and a.so_seri0 = b.so_seri0 and a.ma_mau_ct = b.ma_mau_ct and a.ma_so_thue = b.ma_so_thue and a.ma_thue = b.ma_thue and b.ma_ct = @voucherID) select @field = 'ma_dvcs' if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select @field, stt, '00002' from @@table where @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1) &w1;@field&w2;stt&w3;'00002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table where @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1) &Error; end &EndErrorMode; update @@table set stt_rec = b.stt_rec from @@table a join (select c.ma_dvcs, c.ngay_ct0, c.so_ct0, c.so_seri0, c.ma_mau_ct, c.ma_so_thue, c.ma_thue, min(c.stt_rec) as stt_rec from ctgt30 c join @@table d on c.ma_dvcs = d.ma_dvcs and c.ngay_ct0 = d.ngay_ct0 and c.so_ct0 = d.so_ct0 and c.so_seri0 = d.so_seri0 and c.ma_mau_ct = d.ma_mau_ct and c.ma_so_thue = d.ma_so_thue and c.ma_thue = d.ma_thue where c.ma_ct = @voucherID and c.status = '1' group by c.ma_dvcs, c.ngay_ct0, c.so_ct0, c.so_seri0, c.ma_mau_ct, c.ma_so_thue, c.ma_thue) b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ngay_ct0 = b.ngay_ct0 and a.so_ct0 = b.so_ct0 and a.so_seri0 = b.so_seri0 and a.ma_mau_ct = b.ma_mau_ct and a.ma_so_thue = b.ma_so_thue and a.ma_thue = b.ma_thue -- Gather select a.* into #k from @@table a join ctgt30 b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ngay_ct0 = b.ngay_ct0 and a.so_ct0 = b.so_ct0 and a.so_seri0 = b.so_seri0 and a.ma_mau_ct = b.ma_mau_ct and a.ma_so_thue = b.ma_so_thue and a.ma_thue = b.ma_thue delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ngay_ct0 = b.ngay_ct0 and a.so_ct0 = b.so_ct0 and a.so_seri0 = b.so_seri0 and a.ma_mau_ct = b.ma_mau_ct and a.ma_so_thue = b.ma_so_thue and a.ma_thue = b.ma_thue) -- Insert if @count > 0 begin exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateIdentityNumber @wsID, @voucherID, @count, @user, '@@table', 'stt_rec', 'stt' &Inserting; end -- Update if @type = '1' begin update ctgt30 set @@list from ctgt30 a, #k b where a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.ngay_ct0 = b.ngay_ct0 and a.so_ct0 = b.so_ct0 and a.so_seri0 = b.so_seri0 and a.ma_mau_ct = b.ma_mau_ct and a.ma_so_thue = b.ma_so_thue and a.ma_thue = b.ma_thue and a.status = '1' end
